thread.title: My hack stole your credit card
thread.title_full: My hack stole your credit card

title: My hack stole your credit card
text:
My hack stole your credit card by Erica Fink @EricaFink Some people hack for a cause -- it's known as hacktivism. Laurie Segall speaks to face-to...mask with Anonymous, and speaks with a hacker who fights for justice by attacking racist websites, but finances his operations by selling security flaws. Related Videos Tech's beloved H-1B visa is flawed. Here's why.
